programme.desc: Jamila is about to lose her marriage to Abbas because she is unkempt to herself, children, and husband, she is also disobedient which makes him always sad whenever he is home.

programme.title: Karshen Matar Bahaushe
programme.desc: Sequel to Matar Bahaushe, Abbas wants to marry a second wife, and this takes an effect on Jamila as she turns a new leave.

programme.title: Daga Dinner
programme.desc: Auwal, the son of an ex- governor wants to marry the daughter of an Islamic cleric but his parents are against it because it is embarrassing to their social status. Will it work out for him?

programme.title: Mizani
programme.desc: Amina, who is highly sort after by well to do suitors that claim they can do anything for her realizes who truly loves her when she is mistakenly diagnosed with HIV.

programme.title: Ukwata Ukwu Etua
programme.desc: Documents the tradition and culture of the Ukwata of Etua Kingdom highlighting the blessings of their cultural heritage practice.

programme.title: Chisimdi
programme.desc: After sacrificing so much life in search for greener pastures overseas, a rich woman returns home to search for her daughter.

programme.title: Nwunye Ntuonyi
programme.desc: A promiscuous girl who engages in affairs with men for gains, lands herself in trouble as a result of deceit.

programme.title: Mgbeke
programme.desc: Through the guidance of the gods, a young girl who is maltreated and sold into slavery by her stepmother, grows up to become a queen and ruler of a kingdom.

programme.title: Obi Ojoo
programme.desc: An envious man kills his brother because of his wealth. Now, he is on a mission to kill his brothers daughter in order claim their property.

programme.title: Obi Bobo
programme.desc: As fame consumes Obiora, he forgets his wifes sacrifices, drawn instead to adoring fans and affairs, neglecting the woman who helped build his success.

programme.title: Chekwas
programme.desc: Homeless Adaeze finds refuge in a brothel, clinging to her dreams. Meanwhile, Chukwuemekas affair with Ndidis friend threatens to expose dark secrets.

programme.title: Ebighi Ebi
programme.desc: Ogechi is under pressure from her family to bring a suitor home. When she finds the love of her life, oppositions and obstacles stand in their way of happiness.

programme.title: Ndiowu
programme.desc: Upon arriving in a village, a Whiteman seeks an interpreter to communicate with the locals. An opportunistic interpreter twists his words, causing chaos and mistrust.

programme.title: Ogene
programme.desc: A music playlist that showcases indigenous music artist. It celebrates the culture, norms and tradition of the igbo people.

programme.title: Uka Ukpara Akpa
programme.desc: A girl plots with her boyfriend to exploit her wealthy mother, but when he falls for her, drawn to luxury, she must stop the affair before losing everything.

programme.title: Ejima
programme.desc: In a gripping tale of desperation, a woman resorts to unspeakable deeds, orchestrating the abduction of twin children by hiring a ruthless assassin to eliminate their mother.

programme.title: Ubongo Kids
programme.desc: Ubongo Kids is an animated series about five friends who use STEM and life skills to solve problems and mysteries in their village, inspiring learning through fun.

programme.title: Oge Umuaka
programme.desc: A childrens program introducing the Igbo language through fun QandA, exploring Igbo proverbs and their meanings in an engaging, age-appropriate way.

programme.title: Obiora
programme.desc: Obiora is an engaging talk show program that delves into a wide range of topics relevant to todays society. Each episode features discussions bringing perspectives of views to the table

programme.title: Igbo Bu Igbo
programme.desc: An interactive, educational, and informative program targeting all ages. It encourages all Igbos to embrace Igbo tradition and culture in our day-to-day activities.

programme.title: Onye Eze
programme.desc: Adaolisa is thrust into unexpected trials, tested by fate and forced to confront secrets, betrayals, and the strength she never knew she possessed.

programme.title: Nne Dim
programme.desc: Enduring constant torment from her cruel mother-in-law, a devoted wife clings to love and hope, battling heartbreak while fighting to save her marriage.

programme.title: Ufu Obi
programme.desc: A jealous woman seduces her sisters husband to ruin her marriage, but her plan unravels when a stranger reveals a dark secret from her past.

programme.title: Ndi Enyi Ato
programme.desc: Three married friends test their husbands loyalty as a game, but secrets surface, trust breaks, and their lives spiral into betrayal and heartbreak.

programme.title: Onye Nso
programme.desc: A young woman and her husband deceive people with false prophecies to extort money. Their schemes unravel, leading to public humiliation and forced exile.

programme.title: Forest Of The Maiden
programme.desc: The princess grapples with an ancient curse that claims the lives of her suitors. The king seeks the help of the maidens on a quest to procure herbs for her cure.

programme.title: Onochie
programme.desc: A greedy brother kills his sibling and attempts to covet his property out of envy. Nemesis catches up with him as the consequences of his evil deeds come to haunt him.

programme.title: Mmanwu Ikpeazu: The Last Masquerade
programme.desc: The old ways of religion and the new religion of Christianity battle for supremacy and acceptance.

programme.title: Onye Esimesi Anyi
programme.desc: To swindle sisters, a man bewitches them and continues to have an illicit affair with them.

programme.title: Onye Eze
programme.desc: Adaolisa is thrust into unexpected trials, tested by fate and forced to confront secrets, betrayals, and the strength she never knew she possessed.

programme.title: Nne Dim
programme.desc: Enduring constant torment from her cruel mother-in-law, a devoted wife clings to love and hope, battling heartbreak while fighting to save her marriage.

programme.title: Ebighi Ebi
programme.desc: Ogechi is under pressure from her family to bring a suitor home. When she finds the love of her life, oppositions and obstacles stand in their way of happiness.

programme.title: Obiora
programme.desc: Obiora is an engaging talk show program that delves into a wide range of topics relevant to todays society. Each episode features discussions bringing perspectives of views to the table

programme.title: Nwunye Bekee
programme.desc: Nwunye Bekee is a TV Reality Show which explores marriages/relationships between Igbo/Nigerian men and their white women.

programme.title: Agamevu
programme.desc: Two friends are fired from a mortuary for bad behavior. Instead of improving, they start their own business, only to land themselves in even bigger trouble.

programme.title: Nwanyi Abacha
programme.desc: Struggling after her mothers death from poverty-related lack of medical treatment, a young woman rebuilds her mothers business with the support of a believing young man.

programme.title: Ogene
programme.desc: A music playlist that showcases indigenous music artist. It celebrates the culture, norms and tradition of the igbo people.

programme.title: Nwadiuto
programme.desc: After refusing to allow her daughter to perform a mandated ritual, a mother loses her life protecting her. Her death ignites chaos, leading wives to fight against the tradition.

programme.title: Mmachi
programme.desc: Mmachis uncle, Ichie, visits to warn her that their forefathers are angry because she has refused to accept her ancestral calling as a healer.

programme.title: Ikwiikwii
programme.desc: A mothers insatiable desire for wealth leads her daughter to make a devastating decision of marrying the unknown. She pays the ultimate prize while her spirit dwells among men.

programme.title: Agwu M Onatara Chi
programme.desc: Gifted with the divine power to heal, a young woman dreams of helping others. But her jealous, greedy stepmother kidnaps her, determined to exploit her gift for profit.

programme.title: Jide Jago
programme.desc: A kingpin and power hungry man tussles for sovereignty amidst corrupt politics but when a well trained officer comes to halt his reign, the tactics get tougher.

programme.title: Egbinrin
programme.desc: A woman took a wrong step because she felt the future might not favor her, being the second wife due to her husband wealth

programme.title: Eje
programme.desc: Two couples navigate their ways through marital problems. One couple prays and seek the eyes of God for a child, the other couple with a child cant seems to get along.

programme.title: Okuta Ija
programme.desc: A young ladys swift actions terrifies her victims. However, there is one faction courageous enough to confront her but there will be grave consequences.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A governorship aspirants noble mission is tainted by the ambitions of an exclusive mens club and her personal life. Its a well-known house of cards.

programme.title: Ogba Mecho
programme.desc: This is a series that relates with almost all individuals and the day to day activities at a mechanics workshop.

programme.title: Alagbara
programme.desc: After a proud family receives their son and his wife from abroad, their happiness is cut short by his sudden death while a politician uses his influence to alter the course of justice.

programme.title: Ijimere
programme.desc: Every man who comes in contact with Ipadeola sexually has been exposed to dilemmas. It turns out that there is a mystery hovering over her, caused by her closest friend.

programme.title: Irira
programme.desc: A young mother in an abusive marriage quits with a resolution to live without a man. This situation leads to misdeeds that will prove whether her decision was wrong or right.

programme.title: Daybreak
programme.desc: After the death of their only daughter, a couples marriage became a turmoil. This continued until they embarked on a fateful trip to see a marriage counselor.

programme.title: Alani Ologun Eru
programme.desc: A ruthless slave master oversteps his bounds by committing an illegal act. This triggers a powerful rebellion, igniting a war with serious consequences

programme.title: Chances
programme.desc: A troublesome young lady plunges her family into worry over her unguarded tongue. Watch how this unfolds.

programme.title: Inu Jin
programme.desc: Officer Dele finds himself chasing the tails of dastardly criminals. Teni seeks the attention of her crush Akin while Officer Dele gets a lead on the stolen babies.

programme.title: Oyinmomo
programme.desc: Oyinmomo showcases the beauty of the Yoruba language and culture as well as the achievements of Yoruba personalities in different walks of life.

programme.title: Gborodun
programme.desc: A couple going through hard times became rich thinking it is Gods blessings. The man decides to take another wife and everything goes south.

programme.title: Arolayo
programme.desc: This is the story of an overbearing wife who would do anything to protect her husband even when there is no sign of harm. She lost everything in the process.

programme.title: Soolo
programme.desc: Life is not the destination where you end but the mishap and memories you create along the way. Watch in this thriller.

programme.title: Oniya Meje
programme.desc: Mofe is accused of murder after he walks into his girlfriends house to find her dead. His mother vows never to cry over her son. Was he later acquitted

programme.title: Omonitan
programme.desc: A young lady suffers from a series of failed relationships resulting from a long-kept secret, a secret she soon learns is a result of another secret kept from her.

programme.title: Aye Oniro
programme.desc: A family man puts in all effort to make his family comfortable and happy. If only he knows he is married to a woman who will dissipate all his efforts.

programme.title: Oye Aye
programme.desc: A man wakes up in a mythical land after a sudden slump. In this land, he meets strangers who will provide answers to his questions as he learns from their story.

programme.title: Hush
programme.desc: A governorship aspirants noble mission is tainted by the ambitions of an exclusive mens club and her personal life. Its a well-known house of cards.

programme.title: Ogba Mecho
programme.desc: This is a series that relates with almost all individuals and the day to day activities at a mechanics workshop.

programme.title: Ifedami
programme.desc: A young lady is about to tie the knot but the joyful moment is about to bring painful memories of betrayal, heartbreak with consequences.

programme.title: Matanmi
programme.desc: Matanmi introduces Micro finance contribution to her friends who were loyal and contributed religiously not knowing they are dealing with an unfaithful friend. See how this ends.

programme.title: Aamo
programme.desc: A woman who is envious of her friends charm with men resorts to spiritual measures to shift the attention her way, but will her spell take effect?

programme.title: Omo Iyaloje
programme.desc: A young girl is fortified to ward off unforeseen evil but it soon backfires as it threatens her future love story.

programme.title: Amukun
programme.desc: A tale of two colleagues whose love leads to a conflict that soon turns dangerous when theyre roped in a crime.

programme.title: Ehanna
programme.desc: A young woman in a toxic marriage makes a decision that plunges her in a dilemma of what the society expects of her and what she needs to do.

programme.title: Inu Jin
programme.desc: Temitope discusses Oluwatises academics with her husband while Iya Biliki orders a hit on the Maternity ward Assistant.

programme.title: Wahala Promax
programme.desc: This comedy delves into different family and relationship issues where the little mistakes we make and the wrong decision we take, brew into a series of Wahala Promax.

programme.title: Sawo Se
programme.desc: A young traditional priest tries to make traditional healing a lucrative business. What follows is his rivals trip to jail and a series of atrocities over one mans ambition of greed.

programme.title: Igbese
programme.desc: A father gets choosy on responsibilities when he picks and focuses on a favorite, causing the older to leave. What follows is a web of paybacks borne from a wrong step.

programme.title: Amoke Oniso Fitina
programme.desc: Behold Amoke, the empress of evil. So beautiful, yet chaotic, selling wickedness for less than a penny. Her thirst for power is unending.

programme.title: Toko Taya
programme.desc: A crazy couple hate each other so much that they fight all the time, they love each other that no can come in between them. The team is completed with their crazy cook.

programme.title: Koko Adura
programme.desc: The holy book says the iniquity of the father will be visited on the son but here, the iniquity of the mother is visited on her husband and son.

programme.title: Asake Alagbadana
programme.desc: A notorious spiritualist known for wrecking havoc in a village is visited by her own mother after she takes the lives of her own siblings.
